item.title: Create Timestamp with GitHub Actions
item.description: In case you are into calver or have another reason to create a timestamp with GitHub Actions, do the following: name: <PIPELINE> jobs: build: runs-on: <RUN_ON> steps: - name: Create release version id: <ID> run: echo "::set-output name=<NAME>::$(date +'%Y.%m.%d-%H%M%S')" <PIPELINE>: The name of your pipeline. <RUN_ON>: The runner to use, see GitHub’s own documentation for possible values. <ID>: The unique ID of the timestamp step. <NAME>: The name of the created timestamp.
